description.en:
MyFarmPet is a blockchain farming game, where anyone can buy and own virtual farms, farm pets, and meet new friends.
The game combines the best of the two worlds - a fun narrative for regular game lovers who want to enjoy the gameplay experience as well as an ecosystem for farmers who want to collect and trade farm pets and egg Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).
My farm pet is not just a game for blockchain players but it is a game that could introduce blockchain to millions of players. An open-world 3D game with a strong visual identity based on positive images and cuteness intended for both skilled and Unskilled blockchain players.
